idea-plugin.name: ${plugin.name}
idea-plugin.description: Launches VisualVM's Java profiler from within IDEA. VisualVM is based on NetBeans Profiler and it is bundled with JDK 6 Update 7 and above. VisualVM may be downloaded for free from https://visualvm.dev.java.net/
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.2.0 (2008-11-xx)
- xxx

0.1.0 (2008-11-06)
- Initial release
- CPU profiling (Windows Java 6 only)

Known issues
- Hardcoded profiler interface: jdk16 windows
- Works only with a separate VisualVM install; get it from https://visualvm.dev.java.net/
- Bundled VisualVM is not detected from available JDKs
- Memory profiling is not available
- Settings are not copied to VisualVM's user interface
- No warning if the plugin is not configured (and if you run the profiler once when it is not configured, you will need to restart IDEA)
- VisualVM may freeze if the application finishes execution before it is opened in VisualVM
- No button for opening the currently running (non-profiled) program in VisualVM
- Detecting the launched application from within VisualVM is not 100% sure
